name: Defect Identified and photos added to checkpoint
Wall framing marked out and correct off grid lines
Continuous bead of Ko Rok Fire sealant installed to C Track
C Track Fixed at 400mm centres. (Hilti DN1 16MX Nail to steel) and 6.5x32 Rawl Mushroom Spikes to Concrete)
All Panels fully locked together with no Gaps
Panel joints screwed together 1 side at 1m centres using 10g-16 wafer tek screws. 1st row to be 50mm below deflection head track.
Panels screwed to C trac 250 centres Horizontal (bottom only) and 400 centers Vertical Both sides using 10g-16 Wafer tek screws
Protective film removed and Ko Rok Fire sealant applied to all horizontal and vertical C track edges
Ko Rok Fire Flash installed with sealant and 10g-16 wafer tek screws at 250 centres
All Panel junctions completed with Ko Rok Fire sealant and Ko rok Angle
All Penetration's and door openings correct size/ Location and detail
Area Cleaned, All Swarf and Panel Film Removed
